user.title: Set up Water Monitor
user.description: Configure your sensors and session tracking rules.

low_flow.title: Low-flow leak detection
low_flow.description: Configure when a sustained low flow should be considered a leak.

data.low_flow_clear_idle_s: Clear after idle (seconds at zero flow)
data.low_flow_clear_on_sustained_high_flow_s: Clear after sustained high flow (seconds, optional)

data_description.low_flow_counting_mode:
Choose how time is accumulated during low-flow:
- Any non-zero flow (wall clock): counts all time while flow > 0
- Only time within low-flow range: counts only while 0 < flow ≤ max low-flow
